subject: From: Kristine Wellenstein <
body:
From: Kristine Wellenstein <noreply@dgi.cm>
Date: 14.11.23 
Address: Recipients <noreply@dgi.cm>
Subject: Important $2.5 Million now!!
Hello
I've emailed you several times because my foundation has chosen you to receive a $2.5 million dollars cash donation for my charity project in which I won a fortune of $426 million Mega Millions jackpot on January 28th. Your name and email address came out victorious. When you get this email, please get in touch with me ASAP for more details and the claiming process.
Best wishes,
Mrs. Kristine Wellenstein

subject: Re:   From: Kristine Wellenstein <
body:
Hello Mrs. Kristine,

Wow, that's quite a surprise! I'm really flattered to be chosen for such an important project. Could you please tell me more about this charity project? What is it all about and how was I selected?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mary
